pageContext.claim:
“You saw in the Pledge of Allegiance during the Democrat National Convention, they took the word God out twice. They said, oh, we made a mistake, excuse me.
Then it happened the second time. We said, well, I guess that wasn't a mistake, right?”
pageContext.analysis: Actually, the pledge was recited in full each night of the convention. he words “under God” were omitted at the start of daytime meetings for two caucuses, though.
